document.docAuthor: Barahona-Segovia, Rodrigo M., Riera, Pamela, Pañinao-Monsálvez, Laura, Guzmán, Vicente Valdés & Henríquez-Piskulich, Patricia
document.masterDocTitle: Updating the knowledge of the flower flies (Diptera: Syrphidae) from Chile: Illustrated catalog, extinction risk and biological notes

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Updating the knowledge of the flower flies (Diptera: Syrphidae) from Chile: Illustrated catalog, extinction risk and biological notes

figureCitation.captionText: FIGURES 206–209. Victoriana melanorrhina (Philippi, 1865): (206) lateral view (photo by Rodrigo Barahona-Segovia). Scale bar = 1.2 mm and (207) dorsal view (photo by Patricia Henríquez). Scale bar = 1.5 mm. Victoriana lugubris (Philippi, 1865): (208) lateral view. Scale bar = 1.2 mm (photo by Rodrigo Barahona-Segovia) and (209) male visiting an Asteraceae, Cerro San Cristóbal, Santiago (photo by Francisco Carreño).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type locality and data.
“ Valdivia , Chile ” (T, A, MNHNCL )
.

Material examined.
Coquimbo : 1♂ , 2♀ , Elqui ,
11.II.1949
, Leg. Cerda ( MEUC )
;
1♂ , 1♀ , El Naranjo , Tilama , no data, Leg. NN ( MEUC )
;
Fundo Agua Amarilla , km 7 north Los Vilos ,
8.I.2004
, Leg. M.E. Irwin ( Liter. )
;
Valparaíso : 1♂ , Catapilco ,
27.XII.1977
, Leg. NN ( MNHNCL )
;
3♂ , 2♀ , Bosque relicto, Quintero ,
13.I.1967
, Leg. Vivar ( MNHNCL )
;
1♀ , Quebrada Vergara ,
28.IX.1964
, Leg. Hichins ( MNHNCL )
;
1♂ , Quebrada del Soldado , La Calera ,
24.XI.1960
, Leg. L. Campos ( MEUC )
;
1♀ , Las Palmas , Mantagua ,
16.III.1967
, Leg. Solervicens ( MNHNCL )
;
1♂ , Limache , no date, Leg. NN ( MEUC )
;
Quilpué ( Porter 1921 ); Metropolitana : 1♂ , Lampa ,
20.I.1964
, Leg. Zapata ( IEUMCE )
;
2♂ , Quebrada de la Plata , Maipú ,
17.IV.1967
, Leg. N. Hichins ( MEUC )
; 1♂ , 1♀ , El Arrayan, no date, Leg. J.
Herrera ( IEUMCE ); 1♂ , Macul , no date, Leg. J
.
Herrera ( IEUMCE )
;

16.XII.2015
, Leg. Rodrigo Barahona-Segovia ( PCRBS ; MEUC )
;
2♂ , El Canelo , no date, Leg. Montero ( IEUMCE )
;
1♂ , El Volcán ,
10.I.1964
, Leg. Pino ( IEUMCE )
;

XII.1957
, Leg. Pino ( IEUMCE )
;

15.IV.1966
, Leg. NN ( MEUC )
;
La
Araucanía : 1♂ , Parque Nacional Nahuelbuta ,
15.I.1978
, Leg. NN ( MNHNCL )
;
Los Lagos : 3♂ , 2♀ , Pucatrihue ,
4–21.II.1967
, Leg. L.E. Peña ( MEUC )
;
1♂ , Frutillar ,
1.II.1966
, Leg. J. Silva ( MNHNCL ) ( Fig. 17 )
;
1♂ , Lago Chapo ,
16.II.1962
, Leg. M. Elgueta ( MNHNCL )
.
Chilean distribution. From Coquimbo to Los Lagos region ( Fig. 200 ).
Altitudinal range. From coastal to precordillera ecosystems ( 0–1,600 m .a.s.l.).

Biology and notes. Porter (1921) recorded that collected specimens by professor Stuardo visited flowers of
Aristolochia chilensis
. This flower fly species has also been observed visiting
M. planipes
(Rodrigo Barahona- Segovia, pers. obs.).
Conservation status. LC; EOO = 152,855 km 2 , AOO = 92 km 2 , 20 subpopulations and 21 localities.
